name: Martini
instructions: Stir the gin and dry vermouth with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Vodka Martini
instructions: Stir the vodka and dry vermouth with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive.

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Place the sugar cube in an Old Fashioned glass and saturate with bitters. Muddle the sugar and bitters, then add a splash of club soda (optional). Add ice cubes and pour in the bourbon or rye. Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Manhattan
instructions: Stir the rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange twist.

name: Negroni
instructions: Stir the gin, sweet vermouth, and Campari with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Moscow Mule
instructions: Fill a Moscow Mule mug or a highball glass with ice. Add vodka and lime juice. Top with ginger beer and stir. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon wheel and a maraschino cherry.

name: Daiquiri
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Optionally, serve over crushed ice.

name: Mojito
instructions: In a highball glass, muddle the mint leaves with lime juice and simple syrup. Add crushed ice and rum. Stir well, top with club soda, and garnish with a lime wedge and mint sprig.

name: Margarita
instructions: Rub the rim of the glass with a lime wedge and dip in salt to coat. Shake tequila, triple sec, and lime juice with ice in a shaker. Strain into the glass over ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Gimlet
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass or an Old Fashioned glass over ice.

name: Sidecar
instructions: Rub the rim of a chilled cocktail glass with a lemon wedge and dip in sugar to coat. Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Sazerac
instructions: Rinse a chilled Old Fashioned glass with absinthe, discarding any excess. Muddle the sugar cube with a few drops of water in another Old Fashioned glass. Add ice and the rye whiskey and stir. Rinse the first glass again with the rye whiskey mixture and discard the excess. Strain the whiskey mixture into the second glass. Add the Peychaud's Bitters and stir. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Mai Tai
instructions: Shake all ingredients except the dark rum with ice in a shaker. Strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Float the dark rum on top. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: White Russian
instructions: Build the ingredients in an Old Fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Tom Collins
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice in a shaker. Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: French 75
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute. Top with champagne or sparkling wine. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Pisco Sour
instructions: Dry shake pisco, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white without ice. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a chilled rocks glass. Top with a few dashes of Angostura Bitters. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Singapore Sling
instructions: Shake all ingredients except the club soda with ice in a shaker. Strain into a tall glass filled with ice. Top with club soda. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Bramble
instructions: Build the ingredients in a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Stir gently. Garnish with fresh blackberries.

name: Cosmopolitan
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel or twist.

name: Bloody Mary
instructions: Build the ingredients in a highball glass over ice. Add a dash of Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, salt, and pepper. Stir well and garnish with a celery stalk, lemon wedge, and olives.

name: Screwdriver
instructions: Build the ingredients in a highball glass over ice. Stir well. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Vodka Collins
instructions: Shake vodka, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice in a shaker. Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Sea Breeze
instructions: Build the ingredients in a highball glass over ice. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Sex on the Beach
instructions: Build the ingredients in a highball glass over ice. Stir well. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Kamikaze
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Black Russian
instructions: Build the ingredients in an Old Fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Gin and Tonic
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in the gin and top with tonic water. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Gin Fizz
instructions: Dry shake gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white without ice. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a highball glass over ice. Top with club soda and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Aviation
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Southside
instructions: In a shaker, muddle the mint leaves with lime juice and simple syrup. Add gin and ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with club soda and garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Martinez
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Bees Knees
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Piña Colada
instructions: Blend all ingredients with crushed ice until smooth. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Dark 'n' Stormy
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the dark rum and top with ginger beer. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Zombie
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled Collins glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Rum Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients except the dark rum with ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass filled with ice. Float the dark rum on top. Garnish with grated nutmeg and an orange slice.

name: Hurricane
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Tequila Sunrise
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add tequila and orange juice, stir well. Slowly pour in the grenadine to create the sunrise effect. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Paloma
instructions: Rim a highball glass with salt. Fill with ice and add tequila and lime juice. Top with grapefruit soda. Stir gently and garnish with a grapefruit wedge.

name: Tequila Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lime wheel and a maraschino cherry.

name: Matador
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass or an Old Fashioned glass over ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry.

name: Tequila Slammer
instructions: Pour tequila into a shot glass. Add soda water and lemon juice. Slam the shot glass on the table (with the palm of your hand covering the top) to create bubbles, and then drink the shot quickly.

name: Mint Julep
instructions: Muddle mint leaves and simple syrup in a Julep cup or rocks glass. Fill the glass with crushed ice and add bourbon. Stir until the glass is frosty. Garnish with a fresh mint sprig.

name: Irish Coffee
instructions: Pour hot coffee into an Irish coffee glass or a heatproof glass mug. Add Irish whiskey and simple syrup (if desired) and stir. Float the whipped cream on top by pouring it over the back of a spoon. Do not stir after adding the whipped cream.

name: Rusty Nail
instructions: Build the ingredients in an Old Fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Godfather
instructions: Build the ingredients in an Old Fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Boulevardier
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Whiskey Smash
instructions: In a shaker, muddle the mint leaves and lemon slice with the simple syrup. Add whiskey and lemon juice. Fill with ice and shake well. Strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with fresh mint leaves and a lemon slice.

name: Brandy Alexander
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

name: Vieux Carré
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Metropolitan
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Mimosa
instructions: Fill a champagne flute halfway with orange juice. Top with champagne or sparkling wine.

name: Bellini
instructions: Pour the peach puree or peach nectar into a chilled champagne flute. Top with champagne or sparkling wine.

name: Kir Royale
instructions: Pour the Creme de Cassis into a chilled champagne flute. Top with champagne or sparkling wine.

name: Aperol Spritz
instructions: Fill a wine glass with ice. Add the Prosecco and Aperol. Top with a splash of club soda. Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Black Velvet
instructions: Pour the stout beer into a chilled champagne flute. Slowly top with champagne or sparkling wine.

name: Virgin Mojito
instructions: In a highball glass, muddle the mint leaves with lime juice and simple syrup. Add crushed ice and top with club soda. Stir well and garnish with a lime wedge and mint sprig.

name: Shirley Temple
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add grenadine and fill with ginger ale or lemon-lime soda. Stir gently and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Piña Colada Mocktail
instructions: Blend all ingredients with crushed ice until smooth. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Nojito (Non-Alcoholic Mojito)
instructions: In a highball glass, muddle the mint leaves with lime juice and simple syrup. Add crushed ice and top with club soda. Stir well and garnish with a lime wedge and mint sprig.

name: Virgin Mary
instructions: Build the ingredients in a highball glass over ice. Stir well and garnish with a celery stalk, lemon wedge, and olives.

name: Arnold Palmer
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in the iced tea and lemonade. Stir well and garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Fruit Punch
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in the juices and grenadine. Stir well and garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Iced Tea Lemonade
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in the iced tea and lemonade. Stir well and garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Cucumber Cooler
instructions: In a shaker, muddle cucumber juice, lime juice, and simple syrup. Add crushed ice and top with club soda. Stir well and garnish with a cucumber slice and mint sprig.

name: Espresso Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with three coffee beans.

name: White Russian (with coffee/espresso)
instructions: Build the ingredients in an Old Fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Black Russian (with coffee/espresso)
instructions: Build the ingredients in an Old Fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Mexican Coffee
instructions: Build the ingredients in an Irish coffee glass or a heatproof glass mug. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with cinnamon.

name: Mai Tai Mocktail
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add pineapple juice, orange juice, lime juice, orgeat syrup, and simple syrup. Shake well. Strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with club soda. Garnish with a mint sprig, maraschino cherry, and a pineapple slice.

name: Negroni Sbagliato
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then add Campari and sweet vermouth. Stir well. Top with prosecco. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: French Martini
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add vodka, raspberry liqueur, and pineapple juice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a raspberry.

name: Ramos Gin Fizz
instructions: Fill a shaker without ice, then add gin, half-and-half, lemon juice, lime juice, simple syrup, orange flower water, and egg white. Shake vigorously. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon peel.

name: Pineapple Mojito
instructions: In a glass, muddle the fresh pineapple chunks and mint leaves. Add white rum, simple syrup, and lime juice. Fill the glass with crushed ice. Top with club soda and stir gently. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a mint sprig.

name: Ginger Beer Moscow Mule
instructions: Fill a copper mug or highball glass with ice, then add vodka and lime juice. Top with ginger beer. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime slice and a mint sprig.

name: Amaretto Sour
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add amaretto, lemon juice, and simple syrup. Shake well. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Watermelon Margarita
instructions: Rim a glass with salt. Fill a shaker with ice, then add tequila, triple sec, watermelon juice, lime juice, and simple syrup. Shake well. Strain into the prepared glass filled with ice. Garnish with a watermelon slice and a lime wheel.

name: Pomegranate Martini
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add vodka, pomegranate juice, triple sec, lemon juice, and simple syrup. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with pomegranate arils.

name: Champagne Cocktail
instructions: Place a sugar cube in a champagne flute. Add Angostura bitters and cognac. Top with champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Blue Lagoon
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then add vodka and blue curacao. Top with lemonade. Stir gently. Garnish with a lemon slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Bourbon Smash
instructions: In a glass, muddle the fresh mint leaves with simple syrup and lemon juice. Add bourbon and fill the glass with crushed ice. Stir well. Garnish with a lemon slice and a mint sprig.

name: Mango Mojito
instructions: In a glass, muddle the fresh mango chunks and mint leaves. Add white rum, simple syrup, and lime juice. Fill the glass with crushed ice. Top with club soda and stir gently. Garnish with a mango slice and a mint sprig.

name: Sloe Gin Fizz
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add sloe gin, gin, fresh lemon juice, and simple syrup. Shake well. Strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Coconut Mojito
instructions: In a glass, combine white rum, coconut cream, fresh lime juice, and simple syrup. Fill the glass with crushed ice. Top with club soda and stir gently. Garnish with toasted coconut flakes and a mint sprig.

name: Apple Cider Moscow Mule
instructions: Fill a copper mug with ice, then add vodka, apple cider, and lime juice. Top with ginger beer. Stir gently. Garnish with an apple slice and a cinnamon stick.

name: Apricot Sour
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add apricot brandy, lemon juice, and simple syrup. Shake well. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with an apricot slice and a lemon twist.

name: Blackberry Mojito
instructions: In a glass, muddle the fresh blackberries and mint leaves. Add white rum, simple syrup, and lime juice. Fill the glass with crushed ice. Top with club soda and stir gently. Garnish with blackberries and a mint sprig.

name: Blood Orange Margarita
instructions: Rim a glass with salt. Fill a shaker with ice, then add tequila, triple sec, blood orange juice, lime juice, and agave nectar. Shake well. Strain into the prepared glass filled with ice. Garnish with a blood orange slice.

name: Bourbon Blackberry Smash
instructions: In a glass, muddle the fresh blackberries and mint leaves with simple syrup and lemon juice. Add bourbon and fill the glass with crushed ice. Stir well. Garnish with blackberries and a mint sprig.

name: Cherry Blossom Fizz
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add gin, cherry liqueur, elderflower liqueur, and fresh lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with club soda. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a lemon twist.

name: Coconut Piña Colada
instructions: Fill a blender with ice, then add white rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice, a maraschino cherry, and a sprinkle of shredded coconut.

name: Coffee Old Fashioned
instructions: In a glass, combine bourbon, cold brew coffee, simple syrup, and Angostura bitters. Add ice and stir well. Garnish with an orange peel and a few coffee beans.

name: Elderflower Spritz
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then add elderflower liqueur and prosecco. Top with club soda. Stir gently. Garnish with a lemon twist and a mint sprig.

name: Grapefruit Basil Martini
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add vodka, fresh grapefruit juice, and simple syrup. Tear the basil leaves and add to the shaker. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a grapefruit twist and a basil sprig.

name: Hibiscus Margarita
instructions: Rim a glass with salt. Fill a shaker with ice, then add tequila, triple sec, hibiscus syrup, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into the prepared glass filled with ice. Garnish with a hibiscus flower.

name: Honeydew Cucumber Cooler
instructions: In a glass, muddle the honeydew melon chunks and cucumber slices with fresh lime juice and simple syrup. Add vodka and fill the glass with crushed ice. Top with club soda and stir gently. Garnish with a honeydew melon slice and a cucumber wheel.

name: Jalapeño Margarita
instructions: Rim a glass with salt. Fill a shaker with ice, then add tequila, triple sec, fresh lime juice, simple syrup, and jalapeño slices. Shake well. Strain into the prepared glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lime wheel and a jalapeño slice.

name: Lavender Lemonade Fizz
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then add vodka, lavender syrup, and fresh lemon juice. Top with club soda. Stir gently. Garnish with a lavender sprig and a lemon twist.

name: Lemon Basil Gin Fizz
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add gin, fresh lemon juice, and simple syrup. Tear the basil leaves and add to the shaker. Shake well. Strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon slice and a basil sprig.

name: Lemongrass Ginger Martini
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add vodka, lemongrass syrup, fresh lime juice, and ginger liqueur. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemongrass stick and a lime wheel.

name: Lychee Rose Martini
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add vodka, lychee liqueur, rose water, and simple syrup. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lychee fruit and edible rose petals.

name: Mango Pineapple Rum Punch
instructions: In a blender, combine white rum, fresh mango chunks, fresh pineapple chunks, orange juice, pineapple juice, lime juice, and simple syrup. Blend until smooth. Pour into a glass filled with ice. Top with club soda and stir gently. Garnish with a mango slice and a pineapple leaf.

name: Maple Whiskey Sour
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add whiskey, fresh lemon juice, and maple syrup. Shake well. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon wheel and a maraschino cherry.

name: Melon Ball
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add vodka, Midori Melon Liqueur, and pineapple juice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled glass filled with ice. Garnish with a melon ball.

name: Mint Lavender Lemonade
instructions: In a glass, muddle the fresh mint leaves with fresh lemon juice and lavender syrup. Add vodka and fill the glass with crushed ice. Stir well. Garnish with a lemon slice and a mint sprig.

name: Passionfruit Mojito
instructions: In a glass, muddle the fresh passionfruit pulp and mint leaves. Add white rum, simple syrup, and lime juice. Fill the glass with crushed ice. Top with club soda and stir gently. Garnish with a passionfruit half and a mint sprig.

name: Peach Bellini
instructions: Pour peach puree into a chilled champagne flute. Slowly add prosecco and stir gently. Garnish with a peach slice and a mint sprig.

name: Pear and Ginger Martini
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add vodka, pear liqueur, fresh lime juice, and ginger syrup. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a pear slice and a piece of candied ginger.

name: Pomegranate Elderflower Sparkler
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then add vodka, pomegranate juice, elderflower liqueur, and fresh lemon juice. Top with club soda. Stir gently. Garnish with pomegranate seeds and a lemon twist.

name: Raspberry Basil Smash
instructions: In a glass, muddle the fresh raspberries and basil leaves with simple syrup and fresh lemon juice. Add gin and fill the glass with crushed ice. Stir well. Top with club soda and stir gently. Garnish with raspberries and a basil sprig.

name: Rosemary Grapefruit Gin Fizz
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add gin, fresh grapefruit juice, and simple syrup. Strip the leaves from the rosemary sprig and add to the shaker. Shake well. Strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with club soda. Garnish with a grapefruit twist and a rosemary sprig.

name: Saffron Martini
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add vodka, saffron syrup, fresh lemon juice, and orange bitters. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with saffron threads and a lemon twist.

name: Spiced Pear Punch
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add spiced pear liqueur, fresh lemon juice, and simple syrup. Shake well. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a pear slice and a cinnamon stick.

name: Spicy Pineapple Margarita
instructions: Rim a glass with salt. Fill a shaker with ice, then add tequila, triple sec, fresh pineapple juice, fresh lime juice, and agave nectar. Add sliced jalapeño for a spicy kick. Shake well. Strain into the prepared glass filled with ice. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a jalapeño slice.

name: Spicy Mango Margarita
instructions: Rim a glass with chili powder. Fill a shaker with ice, then add tequila, triple sec, fresh mango puree, fresh lime juice, and agave nectar. Add sliced jalapeño for a spicy kick. Shake well. Strain into the prepared glass filled with ice. Garnish with a mango slice and a jalapeño slice.

name: Starfruit Mojito
instructions: In a glass, muddle the fresh starfruit slices and mint leaves. Add white rum, simple syrup, and lime juice. Fill the glass with crushed ice. Top with club soda and stir gently. Garnish with a starfruit slice and a mint sprig.

name: Strawberry Basil Lemonade
instructions: In a glass, muddle the fresh strawberries and basil leaves with simple syrup and fresh lemon juice. Add vodka and fill the glass with crushed ice. Stir well. Top with club soda and stir gently. Garnish with a strawberry slice and a basil sprig.

name: Tamarind Margarita
instructions: Rim a glass with chili powder. Fill a shaker with ice, then add tequila, triple sec, fresh tamarind pulp, fresh lime juice, and agave nectar. Shake well. Strain into the prepared glass filled with ice. Garnish with a tamarind pod and a lime wheel.

name: Thai Basil Mojito
instructions: In a glass, muddle the fresh Thai basil leaves with fresh lime juice and simple syrup. Add white rum and fill the glass with crushed ice. Stir well. Top with club soda and stir gently. Garnish with a Thai basil sprig and a lime wheel.

name: Vanilla Chai Martini
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, then add vanilla vodka, chai liqueur, half-and-half, and simple syrup. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a star anise.

name: Watermelon Basil Cooler
instructions: In a glass, muddle the fresh watermelon chunks and basil leaves with fresh lime juice and simple syrup. Add vodka and fill the glass with crushed ice. Stir well. Top with club soda and stir gently. Garnish with a watermelon slice and a basil sprig.
